channel.title: [Help] NPC Orientation on Delta
channel.description:
How would I get the NPC to spawn looking either N/S/E/W 0/1/2/3 ?
I heard you cannot do it directly in Delta.
That I would need to make it rotate 90 degrees clockwise or counterclockwise every time the server is restarted.
Thanks, Maizez

item.title: [Help] NPC Orientation on Delta
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

You would have to use the same method that you use for making the NPC face another player. With that method, you would have to devise a system that would face each npc to the certified direction whenever you need it to. I did it before, but I can’t find the code to send the npc’s face mask.

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] NPC Orientation on Delta

item.description:
